--compress=false.Description: compress file data during the transfer

--delete=false.Description: If true, delete files not present in source

--exclude=[].Description: When specified, exclude files matching pattern

--include=[].Description: When specified, include files matching pattern

--no-perms=false.Description: If true, do not transfer permissions

--progress=false.Description: If true, show progress during transfer

--strategy=''.Description: Specify which strategy to use for copy: rsync, rsync-daemon, or tar

-w.Description: Watch directory for changes and resync automatically

--watch=false.Description: Watch directory for changes and resync automatically
